information: All Amounts related to price or cost are in Rands (ZAR)

/{index}./: Returns the respective index of Tasting Menu
/{index}./{arg}: Returns the property {arg} at the index

/a-la-carte-menu./: Returns A La Carte Menu Data

/starters./: Returns the Starters subsection of the A La Carte Menu

/{index}./: Returns the respective index of Starters
/{index}./{arg}: Returns the property {arg} at the index

/mains./: Returns the Mains subsection of the A La Carte Menu

/{index}./: Returns the respective index of Mains
/{index}./{arg}: Returns the property {arg} at the index

/desserts./: Returns the Desserts subsection of the A La Carte Menu

/{index}./: Returns the respective index of Desserts
/{index}./{arg}: Returns the property {arg} at the index
